vote.title: A resolution (1) repealing Resolution No. 241318, adopted on September 11, 2024; (2) adopting a funding agreement for the Dallas Police and Fire Pension System; and (3) authorizing settlement of the lawsuit styled, Dallas Police and Fire Pension System v. City of Dallas, Cause No. D-1-GN-24-004948 - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information)
